scripts.build:css-admin: npm run scss-admin && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:css-public: npm run scss-public && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build: npm run build:css-public & npm run build:css-admin
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'sass/admin/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:css-admin & onchange 'sass/public/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:css-pubic
